title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 460.4 - Certificate of self-insurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 460.4 - Certificate of self-insurance

State Regulations

Any State department or subdivision of the State or
municipal corporation may file for a certificate of self-insurance with the
bureau in lieu of an insurance policy issued by a private insurance carrier
covering snowmobiles which they own or operate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
460.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
